title: Link Magazine Subscription for Digital Access
text:
Subscribers to the magazine receive complimentary digital access. If you’ve never had a subscription with us before, or you’re just setting up your log-in for the first time, you’ll need to link your existing subscription to a digital log-in by creating a username and password.

Set Up Your Digital Access

Visit nymag.com/account, located in the upper-right-hand corner of the nymag.com home page.

Select “Sign Up” to activate your digital log-in and create a username and password. If you’re notified that your account already exists, please email support@nymag.com .

To link your subscription, you may need to input your nine-digit account ID or your mailing address on your profile.
